title: Syncing: syncing devices failed when scanning a QR code by desktop app

labels.name: E:Desktop Messenger Syncing
labels.description: Issues about syncing Messenger data when recovering an account

body:
### Description

1. install the build on mobile app and create new account there
2. install the build on desktop app and select - I already use status -> Scan Sync code. Enable the camera access on your laptop and scan the QR displayed on mobile phone

![image](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/82375995/6224b7da-059b-4a9d-a859-cc34461920ea)

![image](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/82375995/10a1e4bb-e1f5-4372-a893-093843debbd3)


